overview: London-born Lisa re-locates to live in Colaba, Mumbai. She meets with struggling actor, Keith, both fall in love, and he moves in her flat. She rents out a room to Hyderabad-based Siddhant; faces heartbreak when she finds out that Keith has a new girlfriend, Pooja, and asks him to leave. She then gets friendly with Siddhant, both get intimate, and she becomes pregnant.
title: Lovers Like Us
